ing: 1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
1 (3 ounce) package raspberry flavored Jell-OÂ® mix
des: "My mother has been making this form of ambrosia salad for years. To make blue fluff, substitute Blue Raspberry or Berry Blue Jell-O for the raspberry gelatin."
ins: In a large bowl, stir together the cottage cheese, whipped topping, pineapple and cherry pie filling.  Pour gelatin over the mixture and blend well.  Divide into serving bowls and chill several hours, or overnight.
